title: Where to Find Your Apple ID on Your iPhone

steps.title: Open your iPhone's Settings app .
steps.content: Open your iPhone's Settings app . This is the gray gear icon located on your Home screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap your name.
steps.content: Tap your name. It's the first option in the menu next to your profile picture. [2] X Research source If you aren't signed in with an Apple ID, you'll see a prompt to sign in instead. [3] X Research source If you don't have an Apple ID, you'll be prompted to create one .

steps.title: Find your Apple ID address at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Find your Apple ID address at the top of the screen. You'll see your name, your Apple ID email address, and the photo associated with your Apple ID account here. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Explore the information connected to your Apple ID.
steps.content: Explore the information connected to your Apple ID. In the Apple ID area of your iPhone, you'll find: Name, Phone Numbers, Email: Shows the phone number you have set for iMessage, primary email for your Apple ID, Apple ID alias, and your birthday. You can also change your Apple ID contact information here by tapping Add Email or Phone Number . Password & Security: Shows the trusted and verified phone numbers linked to your Apple ID. Payment & Shipping: Lets you customize your Apple Pay account by adding/removing cards as payment methods and a shipping address for future use in iTunes, App Store, Apple Store purchases. [5] X Research source Subscriptions: This is where you can see and manage all the subscriptions you have through the App Store. [6] X Research source
